name: Alien Rush 2D
description:
Simple 2D side-scroller for kids! Battle with aliens and use animal robots!

Aliens came to the forest. Help the rabbit and his friends with cool actions!

This game is designed for kids.

  • World

Fancy Animal and nature world. There are Big bosses!

  • Battle System

It's a kind of classic systems easy to play. Walk, jump and attak with a sword.

You will get robots from animal friends. The robots have each unique weapons.

  • Collection & Customize

The robots can be power-up. Collect the weapons and skills!

  • Characters

The animals in the forest need you help.

The head of the alien is Mars-man. Their space ship is on the top of the mountain.

This game is under development. It will be updated.
